Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicAppBarLayout
    An AppBarLayout to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicBottomNavigationView
    A BottomNavigationView to change its text and indicator color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicButton
    An AppCompatButton to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicCardView
    A CardView to change its background color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicCheckBox
    A CheckBox to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicCheckedTextView
    A CheckedTextView to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicDrawerLayout
    A fixed DrawerLayout when in persistent or locked open state.
    DynamicEditText
    An EditText to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicFloatingActionButton
    A FloatingActionButton to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicFrameLayout
    A FrameLayout to apply background color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicGridView
    A GridView to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicHeaderImageView
    A DynamicImageView to apply color filter as PorterDuff.Mode#SRC_ATOP.
    DynamicHueSeekBar
    A DynamicSeekBar to provide a hue bar for color picker.
    DynamicImageButton
    An AppCompatButton to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicImageView
    An ImageView to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicLinearLayout
    A LinearLayout to apply background color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicListView
    A ListView to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicNavigationView
    A NavigationView to change its selected item and edge effect color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicNestedGridView
    A DynamicGridView which fully expands vertically according to its content height which is suitable to show it as a nested view.
    DynamicNestedListView
    A DynamicListView which fully expands vertically according to its content height which is suitable to show it as a nested view.
    DynamicNestedScrollView
    A NestedScrollView to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicPageIndicator
    An ink inspired widget for indicating pages in a ViewPager.
    DynamicPopupBackground
    A DynamicCardView for the popup background.
    DynamicProgressBar
    A ContentLoadingProgressBar to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicRadioButton
    A RadioButton to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicRecyclerView
    A RecyclerView to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicScrollView
    A ScrollView to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicSeekBar
    A SeekBar to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicSpinner
    A Spinner to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicSwipeRefreshLayout
    A SwipeRefreshLayout to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicSwitchCompat
    A Switch to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicTabLayout
    A TabLayout to change its indicator and text color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicTextInputEditText
    A TextInputEditText to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicTextInputLayout
    A TextInputLayout to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicTextView
    A TextView to change its color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicToolbar
    A Toolbar to change its background and text color according to the supplied parameters.
    DynamicViewPager
    A ViewPager to apply color filter according to the supplied parameters.
    WidgetDefaults
    Default configurations used by the dynamic widgets.
